entity.name: stats_result
entity.query: (SELECT CONCAT(dependent_variable, '_', id) as doc_id, 'continuous' AS data_type, id, control_id, experimental_id, NULL AS sex, experimental_zygosity, external_db_id, project_id, organisation_id, pipeline_id, parameter_id, colony_id, dependent_variable, control_selection_strategy, male_controls, male_mutants, female_controls, female_mutants, metadata_group, statistical_method, status, NULL AS category_a, NULL AS category_b, NULL AS categorical_p_value, NULL AS categorical_effect_size, 'Suppressed' AS raw_output, batch_significance, variance_significance, null_test_significance, genotype_parameter_estimate, genotype_stderr_estimate, genotype_effect_pvalue, gender_parameter_estimate, gender_stderr_estimate, gender_effect_pvalue, weight_parameter_estimate, weight_stderr_estimate, weight_effect_pvalue, gp1_genotype, gp1_residuals_normality_test, gp2_genotype, gp2_residuals_normality_test, blups_test, rotated_residuals_normality_test, intercept_estimate, intercept_stderr_estimate, interaction_significance, interaction_effect_pvalue, gender_female_ko_estimate, gender_female_ko_stderr_estimate, gender_female_ko_pvalue, gender_male_ko_estimate, gender_male_ko_stderr_estimate, gender_male_ko_pvalue, classification_tag, additional_information FROM stats_unidimensional_results) UNION ALL (SELECT CONCAT(dependent_variable, '_', id) as doc_id, 'categorical' AS data_type, id, control_id, experimental_id, experimental_sex as sex, experimental_zygosity, external_db_id, project_id, organisation_id, pipeline_id, parameter_id, colony_id, dependent_variable, control_selection_strategy, male_controls, male_mutants, female_controls, female_mutants, metadata_group, statistical_method, status, category_a, category_b, p_value as categorical_p_value, effect_size AS categorical_effect_size, 'Suppressed' AS raw_output, NULL AS batch_significance, NULL AS variance_significance, NULL AS null_test_significance, NULL AS genotype_parameter_estimate, NULL AS genotype_stderr_estimate, NULL AS genotype_effect_pvalue, NULL AS gender_parameter_estimate, NULL AS gender_stderr_estimate, NULL AS gender_effect_pvalue, NULL AS weight_parameter_estimate, NULL AS weight_stderr_estimate, NULL AS weight_effect_pvalue, NULL AS gp1_genotype, NULL AS gp1_residuals_normality_test, NULL AS gp2_genotype, NULL AS gp2_residuals_normality_test, NULL AS blups_test, NULL AS rotated_residuals_normality_test, NULL AS intercept_estimate, NULL AS intercept_stderr_estimate, NULL AS interaction_significance, NULL AS interaction_effect_pvalue, NULL AS gender_female_ko_estimate, NULL AS gender_female_ko_stderr_estimate, NULL AS gender_female_ko_pvalue, NULL AS gender_male_ko_estimate, NULL AS gender_male_ko_stderr_estimate, NULL AS gender_male_ko_pvalue, NULL AS classification_tag, NULL AS additional_information FROM stats_categorical_results)

entity.name: reSource
entity.query: SELECT id, name as fullname, short_name FROM external_db

entity.name: pipeline
entity.query: SELECT id, stable_id, stable_key, name FROM phenotype_pipeline

entity.name: procedure
entity.query: SELECT id, stable_id, stable_key, name FROM phenotype_procedure

entity.name: parameter
entity.query: SELECT id, stable_id, stable_key, name FROM phenotype_parameter

entity.name: biologicalData
entity.query: SELECT bm.id, strain.name as strain_name, strain.acc as strain_accession_id, bma.allele_acc as allele_accession, a.symbol as allele_symbol, a.name as allele_name, gf.acc as acc, gf.symbol as symbol FROM biological_model bm INNER JOIN biological_model_strain bmstrain ON bmstrain.biological_model_id=bm.id INNER JOIN strain on (strain.acc=bmstrain.strain_acc AND strain.db_id=bmstrain.strain_db_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN biological_model_genomic_feature bmgf ON bmgf.biological_model_id=bm.id LEFT OUTER JOIN biological_model_allele bma ON bma.biological_model_id=bm.id LEFT OUTER JOIN allele a ON (a.acc=bma.allele_acc AND a.db_id=bma.allele_db_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN genomic_feature gf ON gf.acc=bmgf.gf_acc

entity.name: mps
entity.query: SELECT distinct top_level_node_id FROM `mp_node2term` mp , mp_node_top_level tl WHERE term_id='${stats_result.mp_acc}' and mp.node_id=tl.node_id

entity.name: mphigher
entity.query: SELECT mp.node_id, mp.term_id as mpTerm, inf.term_id, name, definition FROM `mp_node2term` mp , `mp_term_infos` inf WHERE mp.node_id=${mps.top_level_node_id} and inf.term_id=mp.term_id

entity.name: parents
entity.query: select f.node_id as parent_node_id from mp_node2term nt, mp_node_subsumption_fullpath f where nt.node_id=f.child_node_id and nt.term_id='${stats_result.mp_acc}' and f.node_id != nt.node_id

entity.name: parents2
entity.query: select ti.* from mp_term_infos ti, mp_node2term nt where ti.term_id=nt.term_id and nt.node_id=${parents.parent_node_id}
